page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content: TRANSPORT IN THORPE AUDLIN Thorpe Audlin is a very small village therefore,it does not have much public transport.The village has transport from the Metro and also the South Yokshire Bus Company. The Metro service has a bus running from Pontefract to Barnsley which on its route, passes through Thorpe Audlin and many other villages. The South Yorkshire Service has a bus which runs from Leeds to Doncaster.The bus does not pass through the middle of Thorpe Audlin but travels on the outskirts of the village. To travel by any other means of transport such as air or rail, people from Thorpe Audlin must travel first to bigger towns with these facilities. Louise Dunn Aged 13.
